entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
